title: Michael Simon-Little Faith
description: In this hard-hitting sequel to Body Scissors  Simon returns to the Austin, Texas, PD of 1995Ã¢â‚¬â€a time when the state capital was changing under the guidance of its new governor. Det. Dan Reles looks at the high profile case of the murdered former child star as a way to jump start his career and his life after being dumped by the woman he loves. His investigation leads him to the most pious power broker in the state and a nightmare of cult leaders and blackmailers.
